overview: Daisies Cloud Passing.  The notice to the startled grass  That darkness is about to pass.  – Emily Dickinson  Daisies cloud passing.  A short film that is gone in an instant – a sunny spot of grass is darkened as a cloud presumably passes overhead.  Like a Dickinson poem, its simplicity startles, then cuts to the bone.  Sarah Neely. July. 2018.  World Premiere. Guy Sherwin and Peter Todd: Recent Work. Close-Up Film Centre, London. 12th May 2019.
title: Daisies Cloud Passing
